content.rendered: The Office of the Defense Attaché represents the Department of Defense overseas and has primarily responsibility for fostering positive relations between the U.S. military and the Ghanaian defense/security establishment.

excerpt.rendered: The Office of the Defense Attaché represents the Department of Defense overseas and has primarily responsibility for fostering positive relations between the U.S. military and the Ghanaian defense/security establishment.
